Text:
Cant u upload a smaller version instead? divx/xvid would be nice. 

Most of us save these but the 720p version is not needed because 1,69GB is 2 large for a TUF episode
Ya'll need to step your game up if your worrying about file size for space saving purposes. Get a NAS set up for a computer that hooks to your tv and stack that bitch with 6TB's lol

@Everyone

For Bellator and Maximum Fighting Championship fans, expect my releases of Bellator 78 and MFC 35 within the next few hours.
This one wasn't budging download wise and the 480p one has no sound -.-

For this who are downloading the 480p, my apologies, I uploaded the wrong file. 

http://www.filesend.net/download.php?f=ab1e38e12d4126bf79c0782333ec6e6a

That's the audio file for the 480p video. Keep them in the same folder and name them the exact same thing and it should play. You can also load it with your player in its audio section within the options. 

I will upload a REPACK of the 480p once this is deleted.

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7764373

This link is the fixed version of the 480p with the audio. My apologies, guys.
Hell yes @Kshelbrock2 hooking a NAS up at home and having it networked to the tv was the best thing i've ever done!! now i download all HD files Fucking love it!

@extreme_one    720p version is not needed?? speak for youself man. I very much enjoy the 720p resolution and have no issue with the file size either.
